New Records: Sacramento Kings' Domantas Sabonis had a career-high 28 rebounds and 23 points, setting a new record for rebounds in a single game this season.
Key Match Events: The Sacramento Kings came back in the fourth quarter to defeat the Boston Celtics, with Domantas Sabonis' performance being a turning point.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The victory extended the Sacramento Kings' season-high win streak to six games.
